messages.message: Hi everyone! Good luck to us all. I'll start things off by taking this nice spot in the middle-north. Those 6s and 8s look too good to pass up!
I'll place my road heading towards the middle. I'm hoping to find some Wheat and Ore with my second settlement to round out my resources!

Hi Alice! Good luck to you too. That's a solid start with those 6s and 8sâ€”very efficient! I think I'll settle down here in the south; those wheat fields and mountain ranges look too promising to ignore. Let's see how the rest of the board fills up!
Decided to point my road toward the coast. I'm hoping to set up some trade routes early on to make up for the resources I'm missing. Good luck everyone!
Hey Alice and Bob! Those are some great spots you've picked. I'm going to set up near the hills and pastures at Node 12. Looking forward to a good game!
